department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 以wavelet及HHT...等時頻方法處理地球科學訊號
goal.en: Data analysis is a necessary part in pure research and practical applications. We will investigate the geographic data by using wavelet and HHT methods

outline.ch:
Review of non-stationary data processing methods
(a ) The spectrogram
(b ) The wavelet analysis
(c ) The Wigner{Ville distribution
(d ) Evolutionary spectrum
(e ) The empirical orthogonal function expansion (EOF)
(f ) Other miscellaneous methods
3. Instantaneous frequency
4. Intrinsic mode functions
5. The empirical mode decomposition method: the sifting process
6. Completeness and orthogonality
7. The Hilbert spectrum
8. Validation and calibration of the Hilbert spectrum
9. Applications
(a ) Numerical results from classic nonlinear systems
(b ) Observational data from laboratory and field experiments
outline.en:
Review of non-stationary data processing methods
(a ) The spectrogram
(b ) The wavelet analysis
(c ) The Wigner{Ville distribution
(d ) Evolutionary spectrum
(e ) The empirical orthogonal function expansion (EOF)
(f ) Other miscellaneous methods
3. Instantaneous frequency
4. Intrinsic mode functions
5. The empirical mode decomposition method: the sifting process
6. Completeness and orthogonality
7. The Hilbert spectrum
8. Validation and calibration of the Hilbert spectrum
9. Applications
(a ) Numerical results from classic nonlinear systems
(b ) Observational data from laboratory and field experiments

ch.competencies: 日地系統觀測技術的培養
數值模式的建立與應用
研究結果的表達及呈現
跨領域與團隊合作的能力

en.competencies: Integration of innovation and critical thinking
Buildup and Application of numerical models
Presentation and expression of research results
Ability acquirement of interdisciplinary cooperation and teamwork

stus.department: 太空科學與工程學系碩士班
